profileAlternative.name: Bruno Carneiro
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Java Backend developer | OCP Java SE 8 Programmer
profileAlternative.summary:
I’m interested in potentially transitioning to remote programming work. Let me know if you have an offer.

Programming since 2001. Currently studying for a master's degree in computer science while works as a Java and JavaScript developer at Accenture. Very interested in Functional Reactive Programming and natural language processing.

aboutAlternative.text:
I’m interested in potentially transitioning to remote programming work. Let me know if you have an offer.

Programming since 2001. Currently studying for a master's degree in computer science while works as a Java and JavaScript developer at Accenture. Very interested in Functional Reactive Programming and natural language processing.

positions.title: Application Development Analyst
positions.description: Java Developer and JavaScript Developer. Developing web applications using tools/technologies like Spring, Struts, Maven, JSF, Oracle DB, Git and VSTS.

positions.title: Graduate Student Researcher
positions.companyName: UFES - Universidade Federal do Espírito Santo
positions.description: Build ontology models using the language Onto-UML in the Research Lab NEMO. (https://nemo.inf.ufes.br/)

positions.title: Flash Flex Developer
positions.description: Worked as an freelancer developer building systems using Flash Flex and PHP. From the requirements to the implementation.

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description: I work building web based systems and websites, e-commerce and content managers.

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description:
I worked with e-learning websites.

Activities with php, mysql, ajax.

given.text: Bruno é extremamente competente e esforçado, sempre buscando conhecimento acerca da sua especialidade, também é um bom acadêmico, possuí expertise tanto no meio industrial quanto acadêmico.

received.text: Enéias é um professional sério em constante busca por crescimento.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Java Developer at PicPay and Cyber Security Enthusiast
MSc Student | BSc Computer Science | BI Analyst
CoFounder e Chief People Officer na PicPay
Cursando Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas
